title: CREC Steve Zwinger: Organic wheat/flax intercropping

tasks.task: Participate in a tour of an organic research extension center's wheat and flax intercrop trial.
subtasks: Stand on the certified organic field.
Observe and explain the wheat and flax intercrop trial design.
Discuss intercropping history and its current popularity.
Explain the 2020 organic flax yield challenges and market premium.
Present current experimental varieties and seeding rates for wheat and flax.
Describe the trial's soil and treatment variations.
Address the impact of previous cover crops on initial results.
